texto: Shipped v1 full-stack site (Angular + MongoDB) by designing the data model and building reusable components.
Increased contributor velocity by creating an internal component library and Atomic guidelines, reducing UI build time for new sections.
Improved perceived performance via route-level code-splitting and asset hygiene, raising engagement on project/gallery pages.
Shipped 65% of UI (routes, chat, dashboards) by building a small component library, reducing duplicate code and speeding page assembly during the hack.
Cut integration friction by keeping the frontend API-contract ready, enabling backend hookup without redesign.
Improved demo reliability via defensive UI states (loading/empty/error) so flows stayed smooth under time pressure.
